title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Random Tip
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/readme","text":"* Tiddlywiki Random Tip * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-random-tip]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main]] !! NOTE * 如果想要在手机端禁止此插件， 请安装browser-sniff !! TODO * add new tip button * add viewtemplate for random tips * add delay js * add next tip button(maybe) "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/01":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/01","mask-closable":"yes","subtitle":"😸 Did you know?","tags":"Tiddlywiki5Tip","","text":"🎉 01 random tips <$list filter="[has[author]]"> by @{{!!author}} "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/02":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/02","mask-closable":"yes","subtitle":"😺 Did you know?","tags":"Tiddlywiki5Tip","author":"oeyoews","text":"
02 random tips
random tip plugin have writted <$count filter=[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[Tiddlywiki5Tip]] /> tips, if you know more tip about tiddlywiki
more <$list filter="[has[author]]"> by @{{!!author}} !! Want to contribute? You have noticed something missing that you saw lately? Do not keep the candies for yourself and please feel free to share with us! You can open a PR on {{neotw/icon/github01}} [[Github|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw]] Feel free to read how to contribute to get started.
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/03":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/03","mask-closable":"yes","subtitle":"😺 Did you know?","tags":"Tiddlywiki5Tip","author":"oeyoews","text":"03 random tips by @{{!!author}} "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/config"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/example":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/example","text":"<$button > random tip test <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param={{{ [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[Tiddlywiki5Tip]random[1]] }}} /> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/filter/random.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/filter/random.js","module-type":"filteroperator","text":"(function(){"use strict";exports.random=function(n,t,r){var e,o=[],a=[],i=parseInt(t.operand||"1");if(isNaN(i)){i=1}n(function(n,t){a.push(t)});while(i&&a.length){e=Math.floor(Math.random()*a.length);o.push(a[e]);a.splice(e,1);i--}return o}})(); "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/macro/macro":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/macro/macro","tags":"$:/tags/Macro"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/random-tip":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/random-tip","tags":"$:/tags/StartupAction/PostRender","text":"<$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[https]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/info/browser/is/mobile]get[text]else[no]match[no]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[Tiddlywiki5Tip]random[1]] }}} /> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"}}}
